attributes.additional_details:
We would like the government to take action on the current British Immigration system which is failing British Citizens.
Applications are not being processed correctly, letters are supposedly being sent out but not received, the Immigration departments are inefficient and incompetent from basic processing errors to information stated in official documentation that is incorrect. These basic errors have caused my family and many others catastrophic consequences.
The System is Failing British Citizens and innocent people are being caught up in all this mayhem. The Government NEEDSS to take action.
